Answer found.

I really need to start testing things out a bit more before =
posting
here.  But CrawlURI.getPathFromSeed().length() does indeed return t=
he
length of tranversals from the seed to the current URI.  



--- In arch=

>
> Could someo=
ne familiar with the Heritrix Arch help me out?  From the

rying to find the "depth" of the current URI from the

urrent URI is 5 links from the seed, how do I find

ms like it might work, but I'm
